# archestra_dual_llm_config (Data Source)

Fetches a Dual LLM Security Config by ID. Name-based lookup is not currently supported; the name field is reserved for future use.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Dual LLM Config identifier used to look up configs. This field must be provided to fetch a config.

### Optional

- `name` (String) Name of the Dual LLM Config. Name-based lookup and filtering are not currently supported by the API; this field is reserved for future use. Please use `id` instead.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the config was created
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the dual LLM config is enabled
- `main_agent_prompt` (String) Prompt for the main agent
- `max_rounds` (Number) Maximum number of rounds
- `quarantined_agent_prompt` (String) Prompt for the quarantined agent
- `summary_prompt` (String) Prompt for the summary
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the config was last updated
